s: Bought Oct 2022. It was delivered Oct 31st. We used it one day then packed it. Took it out this year and worked maybe 10 days before fan went out. This seems to be an issue with the product with how many people report around a 2 week time period of use before the fan stops working.

t: Q: My remote control stopped working. What to do?
s: Try taking batteries out, rubbing them on cloth or towel and replacing them, and then try to use. If that does not work, try replacing all batteries with new. Make certain fan is completely off before working with the remote so that any instructions the remote or fan received before it stopped ...
Verified Purchase Good fan for the price but beware the remote · ...fail on you eventually. For me, it was about 18 months and the power button stopped working.

t: Q: My fan suddenly stopped working. The light ...
s: It had several pre-wired clips. On mine, after I unclipped the one labeled “fan” I found that one of the wires was loose (the purple one). I pushed the purple wire all the way back into the clip, then put the clip back into the slot and it worked after that.

t: My new ceiling fan suddenly stopped working. What should I do? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 7): Check the wiring first. Look for a loose wire nut on a group of neutral wires at the switch box. Unscrew the switch right out to check this wiring.
